Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of Archangel Michael (Psalm 33:7, 8):

Text.Language: P~aggeloc m~P[oic hikw] m~p~kw] n~ouon niben eterho] qatefh/: ouoh a~nau je ouhelje pe P[oic: w~ouniatf m~pirwmi e~terelpic erof.
The angel of the Lord will encamp round about them that fear him, and will deliver them. Taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man who hopes in him.
مَلاَكُ الرَّبِّ حَالٌّ حَوْلَ خَائِفِيهِ وَيُنَجِّيهِمْ. ذُوقُوا وَانْظُرُوا مَا أَطْيَبَ الرَّبَّ! طُوبَى لِلرَّجُلِ الْمُتَوَكِّلِ عَلَيْهِ.
